when <S%G4296><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> had first preached <S%G4296><s%> before4253, 4383 his <S%G846><s%> coming <S%G1529><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>.
